column2: valet is not free and costs $20 to park if there are no free spaces to park your own self. Upon entering
column3: most of the waiting staff and hosts were friendly
column4: but one male server was completely 'cocky doodle doo'. He didn't acknowledge us when we were trying to ask for assistance (seated inside facing the outdoor entrance). I know this is a 'whiskey lounge' but customer service goes a long way for the tips as well as new business recognition. Our female server was not up to par on representing the libations section. Unfortunately
column5: I just stuck with what I knew
